meanings.definition: A woman hired to clean and do other housework.
meanings.sent1: The charwomen worked hard to keep the house clean.
meanings.sent2: We hired two charwomen to help with the cleaning.
meanings.sent3: The charwomen joked and laughed as they scrubbed the floors.
meanings.sent4: The charwomen were like busy bees buzzing around the house.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the charwomen's dedication to their work.

meanings.sent1: The charwomen in the neighborhood formed a cleaning service.
meanings.sent2: Many charwomen were needed to clean the large office building.
meanings.sent3: The charwomen gathered together for a group photo.
meanings.sent4: The charwomen stood out in their matching uniforms.
meanings.sent5: The charwomen's teamwork was truly impressive.
